guidanceItem.title: All unnecessary shares are removed (including default administration shares).
guidanceItem.Author: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan
guidanceItem.content:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that all unnecessary shares including default administration shares are removed.

How to Fix

Remove all unnecessary shares. To review shares and associated permissions, run the Computer Management MMC snap-in, and select Shares from Shared Folders as shown below.

Computer Management MMC snap-in Shares
